Yeah, pretty much my favorite game of all time. It follows the events of the original half life, and the graphics are amazing. It looks like its from 2010(it's from 2004)! The plot is great, the characters a believable, and the gameplot is excellent. It beats most other game's campaign tenfold. Its also very long, it took me around 25-30 hours on my first run.

REVIEW WAS EDITED!
This game is by far one of my most favorite games. It has a great story through the whole game as it takes place about 10-20 (Not exactly sure when) years later as you play through under the combines control but later all the people decide to rebel and make a squad know as the rebels in the uprising as you fight through City 17 to stop Dr.Breen. Dr.Breen is the mastermind of the combine who he has the combine try to take Eli Alyx and Gordon. Finally you stop Breen and put an end to has Dark fusion reactor. Also know as his teleporter to another universe. Tired of MW2 or any other gay ass COD? Then pick up this game, and you'll know what a real game this is because games are usually crap, like COD On a scale from 1-10 I would rate this game a good 9.6 as it has a good story and you can pick up stuff and throw it around it's basically a sandbox game with a story to it. God damnit I'm still waiting for Half-Life: 3 to come out, I heard it's coming out with Valve's new source engine along with Left 4 Dead 3. I can't believe that Valve has made great franchises, and this is one of those great classic ones. You can be creative in any way as to how you can kill your enemies, disapate them, make 'em explode, run them over, and one of my most favorite, shooting objects with the Gravity Gun. They don't have that in COD, do they? Nope, didn't think so, now I'm not saying I hate COD, but it's shit compared to Half-Life, and this game wins over COD any day, that's for sure.

Before I begin I would like to note that I have not played this game, till the summer of 2013.. Nor have I played the first, (only read a plot summary online so I'm not confused playing this one)...

Half Life 2 is hands down one of the best fps's I've ever played.

You play Gordan Freeman, a nerdy, quiet, badass extrodanaire, theoretical physicist on a mission, given to him by a mystery man known as "gman".
With a dark yet inpecable setting and great charactors, Half Life 2 kicks your ass with excitement, and action from the moment you step off the train. While at the same time grabbing your attention with a universe you want to know more and more about.

Keep in mind I am playing this in 2013!

Half Life 2 is a must play classic, go and buy it now.

If you are new to video games then you won't know much about this game. It is a first person shooter yet it challenges your problem solving skills with various puzzles like: How do I make it out of here? or How do I deal with the helicopter firing on me? It is a fun game to go to when you are bored of your usual video games. Also, it is a very very long game.

So. We meet at last.
I've been trying to play this game for a while now, and I think now is the time. To talk. To act. To TEACH THE WORLD.
Half-Life 2 is an Action/Adventure game where you play as the ever charming Gordan Freeman. Like it's predesessor, Half-Life, the game is completely played in the 1st person. And with the protagonist being mute, this leads to a completely immersive game.
The plot of this game isn't as much as amazing as it is intruiging. The layers of plot help thicken it even more that it you would think possible. The game takes place in the classic struggle of alien invaders vs. ragtag group of resistance warriors, but you can't help but feel that something bigger is going on, which makes the game that much more immersive.
The gameplay was pretty good. For a game made in 2004, it looks great, too. It also goes and becomes pretty much every game genre ever, but that's just because it's the first game made on the source engine. There were even some really cool, really cinimatic moments where I was like:
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW YEAH!"

In short, good game, but be prepared to spend a lot of time on it. This is packed to the brim with content.

Ну эту игру знают от мало до велика говорит нечего. Игра супер, даже не смотря на коридор. Иногда этот коридор найти сложно, стоишь и думаешь куда идти, что делать. Новые существа новые примочки. Не особо отличается от предыдущей части только графика физика и звук стали лучше. Разница такая же как и у контры 1.6 и соурс. Кто играл в обе тот поймет. Остальные главы второй части просто продолжение истории. Советую купить но только в комплекте так дешевле и если играть то полностью все три главы второй части. Half-Life 2: Lost Coast является демонстрацией, на сколько можно разогнать движок соурс. В ней находится только одна миссия. И то не интересная. Но весит игра ойойой как много. Не трате трафик и время на эту часть.

"Rise and shine, Mister Freeman. Rise and... shine. Not that I... wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until... well, let's just say your hour has... come again." 

Half Life 2 begins where Half Life 1 left off... only it's been a decade since the Black Mesa incident and Earth has been taken over by a transdimensional alien force known as the Combine. You're thrust into City 17 where the strict and oppressive nature of the Combine becomes immediately apparant, and the presence of the messiah-like Gordon Freeman is all it takes to bring the citizens of the city into an outbreak of rebellion.

Half Life 2 has delivered the most enthralling experience I have ever had the pleasure to play in any game. Valve has taken big steps to improve the franchise in every way possible since the first iteration of the game. 

The graphics are stunning (and still hold true to this day), the physics engine is brilliant and is implemented intuitively to allow the player to solve puzzles or kill enemies with a wide array of objects within the environment. The characters are more believable, more human, and more personal all thanks to excellent voice acting and the Source Engine's ability to display human facial expressions in great detail. Best of all, the story is expanded to a whole new world of fun and exciting possibilites.

The gameplay is equally amazing, fully deserving of the praise and legendary reviews. 96 on metacritic alone is hard to come by. 

It took me 11 hours to beat the campaign in a casual playthrough. It has taken me an additional 12-13 hours (23-24 hours total) to beat the campaign a second time for all the achievements (with a guide; it would have taken me a lot longer without one). There is plenty of amazing content, and a lot of replay value. 

I can't recommend this game enough to anyone who does not own it yet, or owns it and hasn't played it yet. Be prepared to be wanting more even beyond the expansions of Half Life 2 (Episode One, and Episode Two), and finding yourself among the Half Life 3 conspirators who just can't seem to catch a break.

I finally played this in July of 2013. It is a testament to the quality of the game that despite it being the most lauded FPS of all time, I was still blown away by the experience. Solid game play, beautiful textures and a tightly scripted old fashioned Sci-Fi adventure story pull you through the smartly realised world, and still manage to surprise and dazzle you in equal measure. You can see so many of the ingredients that created this magic in new recipes, but this is the original dish and I heartily recommend it. Like Mr Creosote you are left, virtually bursting out of you britches, and if you really must, you can play 'Lost Coast',and while it is an interesting 20 minute distraction, it is no wafer thin mint, so your room will not require redecoration. Delicious.

Безусловно главный проект Valve. Настоящая веха в шутеростроении. В наши дни конечно игра устарела по многим аспектам, но доставляет все так же как и 8 лет назад. Бесконечно уважаю и обожаю данную игру. Пройдена мною бесчисленное кол-во раз, на всех уровнях сложности всеми мыслимыми и не мыслимыми способами. Безпречный продукт, одна из лучших игр всех времен. 

10/10
